error.request_resend_email_verification_code: An error occurred while requesting to resend the verification code.
error.update_email: An error occurred while updating the email.
error.change_password: An error occurred while changeing the password.

warning.email_not_verified_yet: Your email has not been verified yet. Please open the email from verificationemail.com and input the code in the following form.

info.sent_email_verification_code: We have sent your verification code to your email. Please open the email from verificationemail.com and input the code in the following form.
info.sent_email_verification_code_again: We have sent the verification code again.
